title: SET_HUD_COMPONENT_ALIGN
content:
0xEED219F2// SetHudComponentAlign
void SET_HUD_COMPONENT_ALIGN(int id, int horizontalAlign, int verticalAlign);Parameters:id: The hud component id.horizontalAlign: The horizontal alignment.verticalAlign: The vertical alignment.See SET_SCRIPT_GFX_ALIGN for details about how gfx align works.
codeBlocks:
// SetHudComponentAlign
void SET_HUD_COMPONENT_ALIGN(int id, int horizontalAlign, int verticalAlign);
